channel.title: Running Server with uTorrent, help please
channel.description:
I am trying to run my server with uTorrent. I went to Options>Preferences>Connections>43594>Apply & Ok. Then I run my server and it says that Port 43594 is already in use. So I close uTorrent and my runserver, then I turn on my runserver first and open uTorrent and do that stuff again. Now I don't have that Use error, but I can't log in. Whats the problem? (Im running my server using uTorrent because I can't log on with my No-Ip if im portforwarding with my Router :confused: )
Can someone tell me how to fix this, or how to run a server with uTorrent? Thanks.

item.title: Running Server with uTorrent, help please
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Open utorrent, change your port to 43595 for a second, run your server, then change port back to 43594.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2009, 06:44:52 pm[/size][hr]And change your utorrent port to 43594, not your server port.

Read full topic
